extendedInfo.description: Do you have an idea?  Are you unsure as to whether it is a good idea or a bad idea?  This is the app for you.With a simple flick of your phone, you can quit your job/learn the guitar/become an astronaut/take out a second mortgage on your house/eat that out-of-date yoghurt.  The possibilities are only limited by your imagination*DISCLAIMER: I ACCEPT NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE CONSEQUENCES OF USE OF THIS APP.  THIS APP'S INTENDED USE IS PURELY FOR DECISIONS THAT YOU'RE UNSURE ABOUT.  SAWING YOUR OWN LEG OFF IS ALWAYS A BAD IDEA... ACTUALLY, UNLESS YOU HAVE SEVERE GANGRENE OR FROSTBITE - THEN IT CAN SOMETIMES BE A GOOD IDEA... BUT UNLESS YOU'RE CHALLENGED BY UNUSUAL CIRCUMSTANCES, THIS WOULD NORMALLY BE ADMINISTERED BY A TRAINED PROFESSIONAL LEG-SAWER-OFFERER... ANYWAY, I DIGRESS... CAUSING HARM TO YOURSELF OR ANYBODY ELSE IS ALWAYS A BAD IDEA.  SUEING ME IS ALSO A BAD IDEA.If you have any noteworthy stories to tell as a result of Good Idea Bad Idea, I would love to hear them: @edmoyseMany thanks to Ray and Sam HT for the idea and vision to turn this into an app.  GOOD IDEA!*if you're lacking imagination as well as the ability to make decisions, let me know.  Maybe I can make another app.  @edmoyse

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Goodbye coin, hello GIBI. You should add \"I have no ideea\"
reviews.author: Adrian Nicu

reviews.title: Freed from the shackles of my conscience!
reviews.comment: No longer do I have to waste time contemplating those everyday dilemmas - I now have an app to do those things for me. Up yours determinism!
reviews.author: Peter Banks

reviews.title: Life Saver!
reviews.comment: I\'m an indecisive person... So this app actually saves me a lot of time!
reviews.author: James Fletcher

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: Finally I can blame the consequences of my decisions on this ingenious app. Huzzah!
reviews.author: Stefan Bostock

reviews.comment: No longer do I have to rely on my morally-deficient friends for advice!\t... They always say \"good idea\". Hopefully some things will now be bad ideas!
reviews.author: Jackson Martin

reviews.title: Really fun and addictive!
reviews.comment: Me and my friends play this all the time to make decisions. Leads to some awesome nights where you get up to all kinds of random stuff! The app is always right....
reviews.author: Louise Croft

reviews.title: Not just a lucky guess
reviews.comment: I asked the app if I should give it 5 stars, there you go.
reviews.author: Henry Hughes
